website_summaries.verdict: Amazon's top choice, this tactical vest is durable and fits nearly everyone.
pros: Comes in S-XXL to fit nearly all sizes
Double ply breathable mesh makes up the back panel of the vest
2 document pockets can be found on the inside of the vest
Hook and loop closure keeps items secure
cons: Customers commented that the vest didn't drain well and left a musty smell

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great vest at a great price, but it does not fit my chest.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vest. I really like it except for one thing. It does not fit. I am 5' 11 and weigh 220 lbs and wear an XL T shirt. The waist fits with plenty of room, but the chest does not. I extended the straps as far as I could but I cannot zip it up. I might try putting extensions on the straps if I get a chance or hope to lose 20 or 30 lbs. From everything I read in the questions section, this should have fit me. If it fit, i would have given it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jhon

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'4", 240lbs, with a 50" chest. This fits me fine. I took the belt off. My Bianchi belt is better. But, for now, I am wearing the vest without attaching it to any belt. The zipper is not particularly robust, and it is set up on the oposite (female) side. Not a big deal, really. Just don't abuse it. Very comfortable to wear! I work security in South Florida. The mesh construction is helpful in warm/hot weather. I can wear it in my vehicle and for 12 hour shifts no problem. I bought two patches for it on Amazon: The American Flag, and a Christian Bible verse. "I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me."
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised at the quality
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the quality. This vest is exactly what I was looking for, at a great price. Looks good, feels good. Nothing negative to say. Mine has no detectable odor, as I've seen mentioned in other reviews. Zipper is plastic but appears to be plenty sturdy. Velcro (suitable for flag or other patch) where you see the shotgun-shell holder in picture. This would be a nice gift for any outdoor-type person. I'm 5'11", 175 lbs, and there's plenty of room for adjustment either way. Holster fits a Crosman P1322 .22-Caliber Air Pistol quite well, should fit anything that's not too bulky. Might not be roomy enough for a revolver. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Forrest H.

customer_reviews.title: Check product before shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first was good, I bought the second I got a bag instead and it was a gift
customer_reviews.author: Sam Malek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vest for my wife first. She is 5 foot two, and weighs about 145 pounds. The vest fit perfect. Minor adjustments, but fit well when we were finished. I was so impressed, I ordered one for myself. I am huge compared to her. I stand 6 foot four at 350 pounds. After some adjusting on the straps, the vest fit me perfect. This is a well-made product, fits from small to large people, a lot of pouches, holsters, compartments. I recommend this highly to anyone who’s looking for a tactical style vest.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hull

customer_reviews.title: Great vest!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vest! It has tons of pockets and storage and is very versatile with strong Velcro adjustable sections. It is also very adjustable for size. I am a big guy at 275 pounds. I wear a 54 R coat. The vest and belt were adjustable to fit me comfortably. It also can fit a much smaller person. Super cool looking. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great vest!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to configure into my own bug out vest, rather than bug out bag. A bag is conspicuous, but a vest I can easily hide under a sweater poncho or a rain poncho if need be and I have quicker easier access to everything in a pinch. The holster is maybe just a hair deep for my 9mm Taurus Millennium G2 but fits my Tokarev nicely. The two belt pouches hold a pocket knife really well with plenty of room on the tac belt for other things like a hatchet, fixed blade knife, additional holster... It is very easily adjustable. Lots of space for morale patches. I just wish the holster was a little more adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and misleading picture
customer_reviews.text: Misleading picture . Does not have a hydration bladder and tube even though picture shows tube over shoulder. Terrible fit and awkward . Material is extremely stiff and uncomfortable. Also, not well made. With wear and use will fall apart imo.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: LEFT HANDED ZIPPER
customer_reviews.text: So this is my first tactical vest so keep that in mind It seems rugged and versatile with plenty of storage but ... The zipper is LEFT HANDED FOR WOMEN Here in the US Hard for me to get used to
customer_reviews.author: freerider

customer_reviews.title: Zipper shot out after first use
customer_reviews.text: Used it once, zipper shot and multiple teeth were broken. Not what should be expected of an airsoft vest.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: This company definitely shows concern for their customers with follow-up timely emails
customer_reviews.text: The gun holster is not the same holster as pictured. (it is left-handed instead of right-handed) I received the first vest with a left-handed holster mounted upside down! It is irreversible because of the position of the straps to the vest cleats since the vest was designed for a right-handed holster I left these same comments asking for another vest. It arrived. The gun holster is still upside down and irreversible. Apparently, It is a factory defect beyond the seller's control. They are checking into it again to ensure this does not happen to any other customers.
customer_reviews.author: Steven U.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: seriously take peoples advice when they say DO NOT BUY this. Spend a little more money on something better. I tightened everything on the vest as much as I could and it is still super loose on me. Extremely cheaply made and it is already falling apart with rips, tears, and stitching falling out. Serious Chinese made GARBAGE...total ripoff
customer_reviews.author: Keith Caneer

customer_reviews.title: Zipper came off in my hand before iij could ever try on.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my vest. Looked great but when j unzipped it to try it on, the zipper pull just kept going and came off. Other than that, the product would have met or beat my expectations but is totally useless if the zipper dont work. Will contact seller about a refund or exchange
customer_reviews.author: J roberts

customer_reviews.title: Solid 4 Star for the price
customer_reviews.text: Versatile and seems to be well made. Left hand zipper instead of right is a negative and since I haven't used it much I don't know how long it will hold up after reading other reviews. Holster is removable but needs a better attachment scheme to hold top against the vest. Fortunately you won't loose it because of the top strap. Also the bladder tube is sewn inside the shoulder pad which would have to be cut open to remove. Its useless without a bladder in the pouch and interferes with the butt of a rifle held against the right shoulder. Except for these few negatives I would have rated it a five star,
customer_reviews.author: JMatt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy 💯
customer_reviews.text: so far this vest seems very great has tons and tons of space and add-ons and versatility with its ability to move stuff around due to the velcro lock system on it I've carried it in and out of my vehicles probably hundreds of times now as I work for a delivery service and with everything going on I carry everyday..... so that means taking it into my personal vehicle taken out of my personal vehicle put it in my work truck and taking it out of my work truck putting it back in my personal vehicle then back out of my personal vehicle..... Set swell after adjusted can't complain for sure fits my side arm
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical but glad I made the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect out of this vest with its quality and versatility. I am glad I made the purchase. The vest is well made. There are some changes that you can make to configure this vest for most of the applications. You can fit several three 5.56 and several handgun's magazines. The five-round shotgun shells holder is attached to the vest with Velcro. There are several pockets for other accessories you may have. The belt is very well made and strong to hold your weight if needed. Overall, I am very happy with this vest.
customer_reviews.author: Joeh

customer_reviews.title: Not the same vest as pictured or described.
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the vest that is pictured or described.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Splaine

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Look's like a great value for your money. As I started to load the pouches and try it on I learned the pouches are too small for most general items and mags. The zipper broke the second time I zipped it. Very unfortunate because it looks great. This is no way a reflection on the seller. I had a question and they got back to me within a few hours. I should have just spent more money on a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm happy with the vest. Out of the box, it was a tight fit (I'm 6' 200lbs) but it adjusted with plenty of room for bigger people. I'm not sure it can get much smaller so I would guess that anyone under 170lbs would have trouble getting a good fit unless they put it over a sweatshirt of bulky coat. The quality is there and I like how each options included is velcro. Many of these options are removable. Pros: Good construction, thick waist belt and plenty of storage Cons: No plate pockets for vitals in chest of back Overall, I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel B

customer_reviews.title: VERY short.....
customer_reviews.text: If you're 6' tall or more, find something else. There is no way to adjust the height and any adjustment you DO want to make will take a while. It is EXTREMELY secure once on properly. The "hydration pouch" is nothing but a spot you can put a camel bag. The tube shown in the pictures is sewn INTO the shoulder strap with no way to get it out. Not entirely sure what that is all about. Overall had I return this item. It doesn't fit and doesn't have all of the features it claimed to have.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: The mag pockets are pretty good though
customer_reviews.text: Pistol holster was cameo which was weird considering that the rest of the vest was black. The holster also seems to feel cheap. It is held to the vest with velcro and I don't feel safe carrying my CZ 75 (an all metal full size service pistol) because I fear it will fall off due to the weight. The mag pockets are pretty good though, and so is the belt that is included. The shot gun shell rack is in a weird spot for 3 gun, which is what I got the vest for, but if you aren't in a hurry with your reloads and just messing around at the range it works.
customer_reviews.author: Evan12345

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiance and she loves it! It's a good tactical vest, I would have gotten it for myself but I needed a plate carrier (this does not have as you could guess). Quality is great and has everything you need for the range, we especially like the extra shoulder pad support bar to keep the stock of a rifle in place. The belt adjusts to fit almost any size too so that's a plus. It's also very light and would make a sweet airsoft vest. Overall an A+ purchase if this is the style you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra D.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Used it number of times at the Airsoft events and the material in general held up well! But, the shoulder protector is not a real leather so started to wear... It is not the most user friendly construction: pockets are tight especially for AK mags, zipper doesn’t have latches so if it breaks that’s it, shoulder adjustment straps and a side arm holster primarily rely on a velcro to fold and hold in place - no metal loops, no latches. From a far it is a good looking vest but up close the details come into focus...
customer_reviews.author: YaroslavTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Item displayed and item received is not the same. FALSE ADVERTISMENT.
customer_reviews.text: The vest thats displayed online is not the one they send you. These pictures display what they send which is not accurate. The one they sent me had no shell holders on the front. Also does not have a water compartment as advertised. The vest i got also has Yakeda in bright white letters (which isn't very tactical imo) and the one online doesnt. Do not buy unless you want to be ripped off as i have been.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Robbins

customer_reviews.title: The best $35. 00 purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: The best $35.00 purchase I've ever made. Quality of material and workmanship are far beyond what I expected. This is not a cheap toy, but can hold up to rough daily use. All the versatile molle pouches and connecting straps you need, including a holster for a sub-compact pistol, and extra mag holder, shot-shell holder, AR magazine pouches, folding knife pouches, belt attachments, and a pouch large enough for my 2-way radio and extra batteries. Mine stays packed and hanging behind my bedroom door ready to respond to an unexpected bump in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Barry L. Brumfield

customer_reviews.title: Great for Amateurs
customer_reviews.text: This fits generally well and doesn't reduce mobility a lot. It has some nice features and pouches that come with it. My only complaint is that it really needs to have another pouch to hold magazines. There are many better vests but this one stands out because of it's price as the better ones are more expensive. You wont really need an upgrade unless you have a very specific load out and play-style like a professional. Start out with this and move to something better eventually
customer_reviews.author: EliteReviewsUSA

customer_reviews.title: Apparently great for tactical situations, but likely impractical for general purpose uses.
customer_reviews.text: As a civilian, I purchased this vest for general survivalist purposes, and to carry supplies moreso than tactical tools and weaponry. As such, I likely would have been better off investing in a lighter-weight outdoor sporting vest, something less heavy and bulky in comparison (and something that looks less intimidating when worn in public). As a tactical vest, this seems to be pretty well-made, but I really have no frame of reference, having no police or military training.
customer_reviews.author: N.D.

customer_reviews.title: Well it kinda fits.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a Tac vest for a 3xl man. This one is confusing. There are belt attachments you can't really use. The attachment points are fake. The shoulder adjusters are sown in making them useless. Yes it fits but it looks like I'm wearing a tactical bib. For what I wanted it for it will do but if you are a big guy needing a tac vest move on.
customer_reviews.author: Hairybacongamer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this vest in August look really nice I have put it on 3 times I have never used it to find out now the zipper is coming apart at the bottom. Contacted seller with no reply poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Zipper teeth broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking vest, but during the first use the zippers teeth broke, extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: TheBigBeast

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality than perceived priced
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive on both price and more so quality! Didn't expect this to fit. It fits and still can be adjusted multiple ways. More out than down. 46" chest 36 waist 5'10. Too many features to mention here. Belt and attachments to vest are adjustable and is comparable to a separate belt I bought, but this belt comes with 4 molle attachments and 2 detachable pockets. The vest a detachable triple magazine holder, detachable holster. Also the webbing is stronger then any webbing I've felt on gear like this. I assume the nylon to cotton weave is the difference. Finally yes 600 grade thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Jsamurai77

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Tap is on Wrong Side
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised and disappointed to discover the zipper tab is on the left side of the vest. This is backwards from any zipper I have ever owned. Everything my entire life had the tab on the right side and the insert on the left side. No so with this vest... Perhaps sewed in backwards? It makes the vest extremely hard to zip up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made For Smaller Guys/Kids
customer_reviews.text: While it's a great vest for the price, well made, etc., I'm not a fan as it doesn't fit correctly even with side straps fully extended once everything like inserts, etc. is loaded in. What's the point of owning a vest that you can't zip up? I'm 5'9" and weigh 220 pounds. They say one size fits all. Well, I guess I'm not all. Sending back for refund. Sorry, but size your product bigger. I also bought a Leaper's UTG vest and compared the two. Please see my review on that. I ended up returning this product and going with a Condor full on carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid product!!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely gets the job done and more. Plenty of mag pouches for AR or Ak, and handgun mags. It's easily adjustable, I'm a bigger dude, and I adjusted it to my size nicely. I don't care much for the handgun holster in that placement but great If I want to carry more than one handgun on me including my hip/ thy holster. Overall, I don't think it's quite "Swat" quality, but it's a pretty solid product!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D.

customer_reviews.title: Zipper wrong side
customer_reviews.text: Nice Molle vest would be better if could swap rifle magazine like the pistol magazines Velcroed. Zipper WRONG side female style zipper, male zipper slide on the RIGHT SIDE. Keep miss sliding the zipper!
customer_reviews.author: Gnarfle the Gothrock

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a nice bag, and is honestly better than expected. I expected it to be decent because of the reviews, but the ease of adjustments (because I'm a fairly skinny guy), and amount of compartments, makes this vest excellent. Material seems firm. I have loaded up and will be testing it out in the woods tomorrow.. Suspect it to hold up well. Very pleased with this product. Also had the cool factor. Can fit many mags, knife (or two), multitool, cellphone, pistol (CCW), etc with no problem. Would probably be great for airsoft wars, too.
customer_reviews.author: Christian baker

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: disappointed for two reasons. 1. the holster Is too narrow to fit my weapon with laser add-on. 2. Even though there are mesh bags to load Kevlar on the back and the abdomen, there is no way to add protection for the chest area.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Has a huge logo on vest . Looks nothing like the photo and it’s huge for me a small female .
customer_reviews.author: Slaten Cosmetics

customer_reviews.title: Great as a tool vest
customer_reviews.text: I actually turned this vest into a tool vest for when I do security cameras. Holds my electric screw driver in the holster. Holds my wire strippers for both cat 5 and coax cable and cable cutters, tape,knife,connectors and crimper all with in reach. I wasn't sure if it was gonna work but for the price I took a chance and it works great and for the price you can't beat it. Well made and strong. You can move things around to accommodate your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro O.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably fits me, a 5X.
customer_reviews.text: High-quality vest and I was very surprised how well it fits. It says it adjusts out to 4X. But I think it actually adjusts out to bigger than that. I’m a very big guy, and even the belt fit after adjusting. Would definitely recommend this purchase for anyone who is 5X or smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Undead E.T.

customer_reviews.title: Good.....but
customer_reviews.text: Magazine pouches for pistol and 30 round AR15 fits well; however, the pouch for the pistol won’t even fit a CZ P01! Seems sturdy and has a good zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Luis J Abellon

customer_reviews.title: Small holster
customer_reviews.text: I have a Sig Sauer p2022 and it didn’t fit in the holster advice please? I like the vest in general but the holster is a big problem to me.
customer_reviews.author: Shadi Isleem

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate description
customer_reviews.text: Description shows shotgun shell holder on upper right chest. IT'S NOT THERE! Also, one pocket the stitching is coming apart...VERY DISAPPOINTING!!! RETURN!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Z

customer_reviews.title: Attention to detail
customer_reviews.text: Overall well made however, one major oops is the pistol holster was manufactured upside down?? I'd say the quality review function at the vender has failed. By snipping two or three stiches on the holster, my M&P 2.0 full size fits. However, should not have had to do that! Too bad, other than that I'm satisfied with product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: average customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vest.
customer_reviews.text: Great vest, well made, one of the questions I had for this one that I couldn't seem to find, was if the front had a place for a velcro spot, it did indeed have one. All in all on very pleased and recommend it for anyone that needs it. Please hit helpful if I was able to help any! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good Value - Tons of Adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great...a ton of expandable adjustments. If you are a larger fellow...this vest will likely fit you unless you are absolutely enormous. I'm 5'-11" and 210lbs...and the side straps aren't even half way...those who are saying this wont fit haven't figured out how to adjust it. My only complaint is the zipper does not have a stay or clip at the top and it easily unzips itself. Need to add a piece of velcro or a secondary clip to keep that from happening otherwise I would give 5*. Overall great value for the $$
customer_reviews.author: Rob Harris

customer_reviews.title: This is not what the image looks like missing shotgun shell holder and radio pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I should have just ordered the 547. I knew this was going to be a problem
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but needed a few modifications
customer_reviews.text: Decent, but I don't like that it has a "female" reversed zipper. I had to sew/secure a few of the velcro attachments, to be sure they wouldn't come off by accident or have the velcro make rasping noises. I also added three buckles to the front, as I didn't trust the zipper alone.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!! Glad I got it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was hesitant on getting this, but I decided to give it a try for the price and boy was I happy with what I got! This vest looks legit lol I already have plans to order another for a family member. It will definitely be good for a game of Airsoft/Paintball which I will be doing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Hand gun holster was manufactured upside down. Waist size was innacurate. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: The vest felt good. Was easy to adjust, and seemed to be stitched well. However once I started to incorporate my equipment to see how it would function the problems became obvious. Waist was innacurate. The max size was no where near advertised. Also the handgun holster was stitched upside down. I tried to adjust it to be functional but was in able. Purchased two vests. Both had this defect.
customer_reviews.author: RMP

customer_reviews.title: It is designed with the Big Man in Mind
customer_reviews.text: I am a very large man at 6' 3" and it has been hard to find a vest that fits me comfortably. The AKEDA Tactical Vest fit me well and I can carry all my weapon and magazines. The vest itself is comfortable to wear and is expandable as long as you don't look like Santa Claus. The only drawback and issue I have with the vest are the belt loop snap. I had one to break on me. Other than that, I love my vest
customer_reviews.author: Larry K

customer_reviews.title: Seller is not 100% Honest
customer_reviews.text: US Army Veteran here, So I know of what I speak. I bought this as a security vest for work. Since I do security. In my picture I annotated what can be removed. Pistol Cannot be put on other side for lefties, like myself. Only Two Items can be completely removed.shoulder straps are a JOKE, the can be Velcroed tighter, but then cause a fold since it is sewn in, and you are folding material and then velcroing it down!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY VEST
customer_reviews.text: The vest is made of high grade material with a heavy duty zipper. Fitting the vest will take time so plan accordingly. The ends of the adjustment straps were long when I finished as I am a small guy. However. Once the I had the vest the way I wanted I folded over the excess strap material and used black locking cable ties. Holds everything in place and looks good. The one item I did away with was the belt. It got in the way of the zipper and made the vest hard to put on. Really not worth it with just two small pockets on the belt. Overall I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Salmon

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Big Feller well
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'2, and 275 lbs. I was worried it would not fit based on some other reviews. It fits fine with a lot of room to spare. If you can't get this to fit you're not adjusting the duty belt and side straps correctly. Plenty of pockets for whatever you need. I haven't worn it much since I just now got it but the initial fit and time I spent in the woods plinking today make me very happy. If you're tall or wide the belt will come up your belly button or below but you won't find one in this price range with as many features that is longer.
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect and I'm a nitpick.
customer_reviews.text: It's great overall. So far, only one minor nitpick, the zipper is on the left, like women's apparel in the US. I'll just have to get used to it, 50 years of using a zipper on the right-side has made it very awkward working the zipper from the left. Other than that, is awesome. Pockets for four 30rd mags and four of my Springfield 19rd 9mm pistol mags. I'm 6', 200lbs and I can get it to fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jimmv

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing ammo etc on an atv.
customer_reviews.text: The main issue is the pistol holster. Although the firearm fits like the holster was made for it, it is a bit floppy. It definitely needs one more strap that holds the side by the main zipper into the vest. I'll have to fabricate it. It does hold 7.62 p mags but snug.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vest! better than expected. VERY happy with purchase! UPDATE: We order these vests to compliment our Umbrella Corp. zombie response team halloween truck buildouts. the more equipment we have added to the vests, the more we find how awesome they are, with patch velcro mounts, pistol holster adaptabillity, pockets, etc. SUPER happy with these vests. we actually removed waist belt to use belt anchors attached to vest for handcuff holder and flashlight rings, etc.
customer_reviews.author: milton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'11" 240lbs. No problem fitting into this Vest or removable belt that comes with it, with adjustment. I would guesstimate that another 20lbs or so would be about it though. Integrated Pistol mount will fit full size semi auto. Smith 9/40 - Springfield XD 45 - Glock 9/40 all fit. Plenty of magazine pouches. Nice rig.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K.

customer_reviews.title: This is not a serious Tac-Vest
customer_reviews.text: I’m shocked this is a top seller. This is a play vest covered in Velcro. The holster couldn’t even fit either of my compacts or a Bersa Thunder .380. Only pistol that fit was a P238 “micro” pocket gun! This must be a toy for airsoft because this is not a serious tac vest!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I was hesitant to purchase this item given the negative reviews it had in regards to quality and size but they were not warranted. First off the vest came very well packaged. As far as fit, I am a short but not small man and I had NO issues with fit. The side adjustments worked great and once I got the belt to the right size as well ( I had to remove the two front small Velcro pouches on either side to get it there, then put them back on), it fit great! Great vest, I will recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Jasen S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price and is indeed one size fits all with the adjustment straps.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is really good quality with all the basic pouches/compartments you would want. The adjustable straps truly makes this an easy fit for just about anybody. I usually find these types of items to be to small for me, but this with the adjustability of it could easily fit a person a fair bit larger than me.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price point for a great product
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how well these vests were made at that price point. They have more than enough storage space for mags and the added holster was surprisingly stable. I’d definitely recommend this vest for normal, non-combat/LE use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

customer_reviews.title: Prepped, duck hunter, whatever. You'll look good
customer_reviews.text: Solid build looks ready to go into battle. Lots of handy pockets for when you know what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Jiskra

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, durable, and adjusts to fit. The velcro is really strong and the extra inside pockets (front and back) are an added bonus to this vest. The back pouch fits water bladder perfectly. Tip for bigger guys, when you first open it loosen up all the straps all the way, then put it on and tighten all the straps to fit. I would highly recommend this vest!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: You get a lot for your money
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at just how versatile this vest is. There are plenty of places to secure extra magazines, rounds, loaders, etc. And since it's MOLLE design, you can carry all that stuff without feeling weighed down.
customer_reviews.author: William Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, very cool!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This vest is bad a$$. Lots of mag storage and very rugged. High quality materials including the zipper.My AR mags fit perfectly in each of the 5 mag pouches and both my 9mm and 45 fit nicely in the front holster. Also plenty of room to add on the back with the molle system. I can only assume this thing will take a beating and last a long time. Even though the zombie apocalypse that everyone is waiting for.
customer_reviews.author: Military guru

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Cannot adjust the height of this. The small adjustments that need to be made do not hold properly. Basically, every time you put it on you'll need a second assistant to adjust. China made shiza.
customer_reviews.author: Real Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I honestly didn't know what to expect, because when you cant actually hold the item, its a gamble. One of the most professional pieces of tactical equipment that I've seen. I love this vest. The only thing that didn't work out was the handgun holster. Its made for a very slim firearm. It releases the magazine clip if I try to holster the weapon. But that can easily be fixed. You guys are impressive. Quick shipping and a great product
customer_reviews.author: Andy D.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Total garbage.
customer_reviews.text: The cheap Chinese plastic and poor workmanship make this a one-star product. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great tac vest
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Fits great even over cold weather gear. Perfect way to balance out a bug out bag. I have a G19 in the holster. 3 ar mags. Knife,light,multi tool. Still room for more. Love the shoulder pad. Buy this. You will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Nice Vest
customer_reviews.text: Removed a few things (belt and one pouch) to make it lighter. Put a few stitches on upper part of holster so it hangs straighter. Fits 170 lb 5'10" me.
customer_reviews.author: Josefina in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 210lb 5,8. Size 40 waist and it fits with a few inches extra. Shoulder pad isn't exactly were I rest the butt of a stock but I expected that. Shotgun shells for tight but all loops work with my 12ga. 9mm Ruger pistol fits nice. My ar-15 30rd mags fit nice with one per pouch. The mesh backing will be nice for hot days. Material seems solid mesh aside. Lots of strong Velcro for fine tuning. Great buy. Ty
customer_reviews.author: justinb

customer_reviews.title: This may well be the best third-party vendor selliñg through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This may well be the best third-party vendor selliñg through Amazon. I compared this vest to vests sold through big 5 and other similar outlets. It was not only half the cost it was twice the quality!! Arrived timely, and packaged quite well. The stitching is heavy duty, the materials of construction are top quality. The only suggestion I would make is that you buy two (one for a friend)
customer_reviews.author: dan mcgill

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was watching this and it dropped to a really low price. When it arrive and I inspected it, I was surprised how good this is. Not cheap junk. its very adjustable (but complicated to do so). However, unsurprisingly, it's heavy and hot. Also, this will not fit overweight American men as far as I can tell by playing with the adjustments. Mine seems to be for slim/ fit males.
customer_reviews.author: Senoralitha

customer_reviews.title: This vest is AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This vest is AWESOME!! It's better than I expected for the price. So well made, LOTS of storage, and FULLY adjustable. Plus, it shipped earlier than expected! I am VERY happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K.

customer_reviews.title: Great material, Easy to move in!
customer_reviews.text: This is one amazing vest. It has every component you can think of. Easy zipper in the front. You can adjust it to be a small to a large. Its quite simple. I like that it has room to grow in. Not to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walls

customer_reviews.title: Looked nice
customer_reviews.text: Took way too long to receive and returned it once it did arrive. Customer service took care of the return including shipping back. Went in a different direction for my tactical vest needs.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Y

customer_reviews.title: Missing what I saw four other buyers get in the package.
customer_reviews.text: I have four coworkers that ordered this vest for work. And the main selling point I wanted, I did not get. They got a replacement mag pouch to switch out with their holster. I did not. I used the same exact link they all used on Amazon. And I feel a little robbed. Other than that issue. Its not a bad vest. For $40 you get a pretty good deal I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Mimzy

customer_reviews.title: Has great functionality and fits well
customer_reviews.text: Wore this for 8 hours straight at a tactical rifle defense course. Has great functionality and fits well. Also has lots of adjustments that can be made for your personal rig preference. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because I wish there was more padding on the shooting shoulder. Standing for that long with my rifle harness hooked in to the shoulder clip caused some soreness. Otherwise like it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Judd

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money and loaded with pouches and pockets
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1 at 255 lbs, the vest was more than large enough for me. Took a little adjusting but no other fitting issues. The holster is mean for longer barrel guns and work ok with a longer revolver. Loaded with pouches for ammo or extra clips. 12ga shells fit perfect with a large pouch just behind it. Cell phone and hand held radio located at easily to get to locations on the vest. So far the quality exceeds my expectations. And really moveable and easy to get to everything!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy. 5'11" 270 lbs. Tape around waist 55", tip to tip shoulders 18", chest 50". I was concerned, as always, about fit. This vest fits well with room to spare. Now I can carry multiple items without my pants falling off. Hope this honest and straightforward info helps. G'day.
customer_reviews.author: azsunnin

customer_reviews.title: fully adjustable
customer_reviews.text: the vest fits great after adjusting belt straps. the snaps seem to hold well. the belt is heavy duty. when putting my 9mm pistol in the chest holder it did not seem to hold on the Velcro securely, too heavy. the zipper on the vest zips from the wrong side, but overall I like it. it holds lots of magazines and has many pouches and pockets
customer_reviews.author: bushwacker

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: I greatly enjoyed the vest; it has pouches for just about everything you'll need in airsoft. When you include the value of the pouches you'll have big savings. The only downfall is that many of the pouches are not adjustable but the pistol holster is adjustable to a medium degree. Overall best deal and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Austen

customer_reviews.title: Construction seems to be pretty good (remember the price of this is not that ...
customer_reviews.text: Just needed something to go to the range with to keep all the stuff you accumulate in one place and handy. Construction seems to be pretty good (remember the price of this is not that high). Adjustment of the straps is a little tricky due sheer number of straps. Just remember to let the belt out before you try to make adjustments. Again, this is not a vest for armor plates and just keeps your mags and stuff handy for the range.
customer_reviews.author: D. In KC

customer_reviews.title: Decent build quality,  but sizing seems off.
customer_reviews.text: The item is decent. The size info is not correct... it states 53inch waist... im 46 waist and i have the vest sides and the belt fully extended. The pouches seems to fit mags without issues. But figured i would warn folks thatvare checking the sizes in the description. I do wish the pistol holster was easily rotated at 45 degree... instead of the 90 degree.. it is hook and loop so i can turn it, but it does not securely attach with the top strap. Hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Ultimaron

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 10 week old German Shepherd Dog. Looks great, it will grow with him over the next few months. Like the short lease that matches, and keeps him close while training to walk on the lease. Good quality even with him chewing on it a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of magazines holders
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tactical vest plenty of magazine holders which means plenty of ammo and I like the cross draw holster for my pistol.. another item that I like is that there’s a place to put a camel pack so you will have access to water while wearing this vest.. haven’t had a chance to get out to the range with it yet but I tried it on and definitely see that this is going to get good use..
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons Halloween costume, he was very happy with it. It’s just as the picture shows and as the description says. It seems very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: dayna nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit. Was worried about it not fitting. I’m a big person with a big athletic build. Hard to find things that go over my shoulders and chest. But this fit great and holds plenty of ammo with easily accessible pockets and many Velcro enclosures.
customer_reviews.author: A. P.

customer_reviews.title: Being Prepared
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Vest as part of my prepping gear. The weight is great and it is easy to store. It will allow me to carry everything I need should it's use ever be required.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected doesn’t fit properly very cheap filling and looking I’m sending it back. Made in China
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a carpenter and uses this vest for work. He was even able to add additional items on. Such a great investment. It's light and saves him from a lot of back pain
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty unreal for the price you pay! I've run hundreds of miles in this vest, and it's holding up perfectly! Hold tons of stuff, velcro has really strong hold, and is pretty versatile! I just advise wearing long sleeve shirts for extended wear. The inside of your biceps will thank you...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made , no customer support.
customer_reviews.text: It will work , barely. Zipper is backwards as it for a woman. If you were like me it’s not natural to put on that way. Holster was sewn up not allowing a pistol to be put in it. I attempted to reach customer support with no return correspondence. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: OK quality vest but the holster wound not even fit a small frame pistol. Also sizing was an issue I am 6ft 230 lbs - I had to max out the size adjustment for it to fit me. I kept the vest since I was able to do some customizations to adapted it for my use
customer_reviews.author: William R. Gunkel

customer_reviews.title: Take my money!
customer_reviews.text: This is so bada** I love it. I bought if for my nephews NERF war. So us adults can get in on the action. All adjustable straps fit everything!!!
customer_reviews.author: dobo

customer_reviews.title: Smells musty
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest but it has mold on it and smells musty I'm very upset
customer_reviews.author: tony sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose vest
customer_reviews.text: A multi-purpose vest for the hunter, shooter, outdoorsman, medic and is only limited by lack of imagination on its usage. Loads of pockets to hold most anything. Only complaint is the zipper is on left but that's minor for a right hander. Well made, good threading, feels sturdy and it's adjustable to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Great, lightweight sporting vest
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made for versatility. You can use it for camping, paintball, civil war, lots of stuff. I found its handy for narrow dark areas as well using the pockets for a variety of tools. Also very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Crypto

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time posting my review, since amazon keeps removing it. this is a poor quality product. the holster was manufactured upside down and completely useless. Cheap plastic buckle on the belt which also includes fake belt keepers.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Childs

product_meta.title: YAKEDA Tactical Vest Outdoor Ultra-Light Breathable Combat Training Vest Adjustable for Adults 600D Encryption Polyester-VT-1063
feature_bullets: 【ITEM SIZE】Adjustable for adults, S-XXXXL: the maximum waist is 57 inches (145cm), the smallest waist is 35 inches (89CM); the longest length is 22.5 inches (57cm); the shortest length is 20.5 inches (52cm), it could be adjusted to fit the shoulder and waist size, please pay attention to the size of the information before ordering.
【ADJUSTABLE】Adjustable shoulder and side straps,belt design allows you to adjust it according to your needs, so you have full freedom of movement.
【HIGH QUALITY】 Made from durable, comfortable high-density 600D Polyester,With mesh design, more breathable and light.
【MULTIFUNCTION】Has plenty removable pouches and Hook-and-loop Closure, Drain Holes and Elastic excellent plug in systems, so it is reasonable and well organized when playing the CS game .
【USES】CS Game,Army fan, mountaineering, fashion, business,outdoors activity,Target Shooting,Law Enforcement,Air Soft&Paint ball,Cosplay of Counter Strike game.
